node.html: Writing better code is what makes great developers, a great codebase, and great products. So how can you use Swift's power to make your life easier and your code even better? Presented at Swift Berlin #21.

frontmatter.title: Using Swift to write better code

node.html: Being a craftsman in development practices is only part of the problem! We'll have a brief look at some principles that help make great software, and the hints that your code can give you about what you can improve. Presented at Android Manchester.

Writing better code is what makes great developers, a great codebase, and great products. So how can you use Swift's power to make your life easier and your code even better? Presented at Swift Berlin #21.
Take a look at the new APIs available in Android Lollipop, how to apply them, and what they look like in a production environment. Presented at Android Manchester.
